intro: I am currently learn about Angular Framework
about: Front-end developer, with no experience working on large projects. I started studying programming at the beginning of 2022 and I identified more with the languages ​​used in front-end development, but in the future I intend to become a full stack developer and thus be able to perform with excellence any activity that is assigned to me.
I consider myself a hardworking person, I always do my best and I like to be in constant learning to acquire new knowledge!
